titleStmt.title: The young mans resolution to the maidens request. A witty dialogue between a young man and a maid. Wherein she asks him when he intends to marry, and he resolves her how long he will tarry. To the tune of, Summer time.
titleStmt.author: J. S. (John Shirley), fl. 1680-1702.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to John Shirley by Wing (2nd ed.)
Right half-sheet contains: The second part, to the same tune.
Reproduction of original in: University of Glasgow. Library.
